archimate:Requirement.name: BA.1.1.2: Details of business applications should be recorded in one or more registers that contain operational details (e.g. business purpose, owner and unique description), together with specific details relevant to business applications, including:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
